description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' using Google Mock for testing purposes. The class provides mocked methods for the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' and 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink' interfaces, enabling unit testing of components that depend on these interfaces. The file includes dependencies like 'Module.h' and 'gmock/gmock.h'.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class for 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' and 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink', used for testing components that depend on these interfaces.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates if the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks support for a specific feature or capability.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a JSON element along with a uint32_t identifier.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with two strings.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Checks if the service runs in background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a given reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a given reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for the last state change.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overload)
methods.description: Sets configuration line with a string parameter.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns the start mode of the service.

methods.name: StartMode (second overload)
methods.description: Starts the service with a specified start mode.
